bibl.title: Again the Tattoo Elegy.
bibl.note: Replies to: S.R. SLINGS, Hermesianax and the Tattoo Elegy (P. Brux. inv. E 8934 and P. Sorb. inv. 2254), ZPE 98 (1993) pp. 29-37, 2 tabl. - P. Brux. II, 22. "Huys' conjecture that Hermesianax is the author falls a good deal short of certainty, but it was worth drawing attention to the possibility, and it must be borne in mind." - Additional remarks, concerning col. i, 8; 16-19; ii, 11; 14.
LLOYD-JONES Hugh, Again the Tattoo Elegy.
